mapper.select: SELECT A.MID MID FROM SPRING_MEMBER A WHERE DELETEYN = 'Y' AND A.MID = #{mid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT A.MNUM MNUM ,A.MNAME MNAME ,A.MID MID ,A.MPW MPW ,A.MGENDER MGENDER ,A.MBIRTH MBIRTH ,A.MHP MHP ,A.MTEL MTEL ,A.MEMAIL MEMAIL ,A.MZONECODE MZONECODE ,A.MROADADDRESS MROADADDRESS ,A.MJIBUNADDRESS MJIBUNADDRESS ,A.MHOBBY MHOBBY ,A.MINFO MINFO ,A.MPHOTO MPHOTO ,A.MADMIN MADMIN ,A.DELETEYN DELETEYN ,TO_CHAR(A.INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INSERTDATE ,TO_CHAR(A.UPDATETDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATEDATE FROM SPRING_MEMBER A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT A.MNUM MNUM ,A.MNAME MNAME ,A.MID MID ,A.MPW MPW ,A.MGENDER MGENDER ,A.MBIRTH MBIRTH ,A.MHP MHP ,A.MTEL MTEL ,A.MEMAIL MEMAIL ,A.MZONECODE MZONECODE ,A.MROADADDRESS MROADADDRESS ,A.MJIBUNADDRESS MJIBUNADDRESS ,A.MHOBBY MHOBBY ,A.MINFO MINFO ,A.MPHOTO MPHOTO ,A.MADMIN MADMIN ,A.DELETEYN DELETEYN ,TO_CHAR(A.INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INSERTDATE ,TO_CHAR(A.UPDATETDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATEDATE FROM SPRING_MEMBER A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND A.MNUM = #{mnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: UPDATE SPRING_MEMBER SET DELETEYN = 'N' ,UPDATEDATE = SYSDATE WHERE DELETEYN = 'Y' AND A.MNUM = #{mnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
